articles.author: Michael Voepel
articles.title: Clark, Collier draft All-Star teams, flip coaches - ESPN
articles.description: Caitlin Clark selected her two Indiana All-Star teammates in the draft to determine teams for the WNBA All-Star Game on July 19.
articles.content: All three Indiana Fever All-Stars will be on the same team for the WNBA All-Star Game in Indianapolis on July 19. The rosters, as chosen by captains Caitlin Clark of the Fever and Napheesa Collier of… [+2686 chars]
